name: Distorted Illusions
description: Distorted Illusions is a free and relaxing block puzzle game featuring 2 modes, 6 puzzles, and many environments. Upgrade to Distorted Illusions Premium for more puzzles, difficulties up to 12x12, and the ability to import your own puzzles!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
